General.Name: China Vanadium Titano-Magnetite Mining Company Limited
General.Description: China Vanadium Titano-Magnetite Mining Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in mining and ore processing activities in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: High-Fe Mining Operation; Trading; and Corporate and Others. The company engages in the operation of sale of self-produced high-grade iron concentrates, and trading steel. In addition, it is involved in the provision of facilities management services for the mining operations; and management of strategic investments. Further, the company engages in the iron ore and gypsum ore beneficiation activities, as well as provision of mining and construction consulting, and estate management services. Additionally, it sells equipment and materials; and leases real estate properties. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Times Square, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
